children.text: During the first part (Shu) of the curve, your team has not generated enough experience so you should do what others before you did (Do Scrum).
During the middle part (Ha) you should start to challenge what others do but you should have a reason for challenging it.
During the last part (Ri) now you must stand alone. Scrum is no longer an acceptable appeal. You must defend the reasoning behind why you should stay with scrum.
